document.masterDocTitle: Species diversity and distributions of microdrile earthworms (Annelida, Clitellata, Enchytraeidae) from South America

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Species diversity and distributions of microdrile earthworms (Annelida, Clitellata, Enchytraeidae) from South America

bibRefCitation.author: Southern
bibRefCitation.refString: Southern, R. (1913) Clare Island Survey. Part 48. Oligochaeta. Proceedings of the Royal Irish Academy Section B, 31, 1 - 14.

subSubSection.paragraph:
17 .
Grania atlantica
Coates and Erséus, 1985

Distr: SUR: 08º58.0´N ,
54 º04.3´W
, 1456-1518 m (
Coates & Erséus 1985 , p. 112
). Furth. Distr: Widely distributed in the east and west Atlantic from
48 º35.4´N
to 09º05´S , in depths of from about 740 to 1800 m (
Coates & Erséus 1985 , p. 113
).

Guaranidrilus
Č
ernosvitov, 1937

18 *.
Guaranidrilus athecatus
Christoffersen, 1977
Distr
: BRA : SP: Atlantic Forest: Evangelista de Souza (
Christoffersen 1977 , p. 201
). Rem: Terrestrial species (
Römbke 2007 , p. 163
).

subSubSection.paragraph:
20 *.
Guaranidrilus cernosvitovi
Healy, 1979

Syn. for South America :
Guaranidrilus fridericoides
(nom. nud.) Č ernosvitov, 1937 b. Distr: ARG (
Healy 1979 , p. 10
).

21 *.
Guaranidrilus finni
Christoffersen, 1977

22 *.
Guaranidrilus glandulosus
Č ernosvitov, 1937
Distr: ARG: Misiones Prov: Loreto, near Santa Ana (Č ernosvitov 1937 b, p. 149 ). Rem: Terrestrial species (Cernosvitov 1937 b, p. 151 ).

23 *.
Guaranidrilus joanae
Christoffersen, 1977

tr.th: Distr: BRA: SP: Iporanga Mun: Lower Alambari

subSubSection.paragraph:
25 *.
Guaranidrilus oiepe Righi, 1974

Distr: BRA : MG: Conceição do Mato Dentro city: Serra do Cipó; RJ: Serra do Itatiaia (
Righi 1974 a
, p. 144 ); MT: Sidrolândia, Lagoinha farm; PA : Amazônia Tapajós National Park (
Righi 1981 a
, p. 427 ). Rem: Terrestrial species (
Römbke 2007 , p. 163
).

26 *.
Guaranidrilus rarus
Č ernosvitov, 1937

Distr: ARG: Misiones Prov: Loreto, near Santa Ana (Č ernosvitov 1937 b, p. 151 ). Rem: Not G. r a r u s ,
Righi 1973
(non Č ernosvitov, 1937 b), which refers to
Guaranidrilus sawayai
. Terrestrial species (
Römbke 2007 , p. 163
).

27 *.
Guaranidrilus sawayai
Righi, 1973

Other name for South America :
Guaranidrilus rarus ,
Righi 1973
(non Č ernosvitov, 1937 b). Distr: BRA : MG: Conceição do Mato Dentro Mun: Serra do Cipó: Usina farm, near Capivara river (
Righi 1973 , p. 470
); PA : Amazônia Tapajós National Park (
Righi 1981 a
, p. 428 ). Rem: Terrestrial species (
Römbke 2007 , p. 163
).
